title: Spring forces - 2M block and springs in series

content.question: When a block of mass <math alttext="M" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>M</mi></math> is hung vertically from a spring, the spring is stretched by a distance <math alttext="D" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>D</mi></math> compared to its unstretched length. If a second identical spring is connected in series with the first spring and a larger block of mass <math alttext="2 M" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn><mi>M</mi></math> is then hung vertically from the two-spring combination, by how much is the combination stretched compared to its unstretched length?

skill.text: 2.D: Predict new values or factors of change of physical quantities using functional dependence between variables.
